definitions.definition: (of a source of light) to shine with a flickering light; to glimmer
definitions.example: We could see the lights of the village twinkling in the distance.

definitions.definition: (chiefly of eyes) to be bright with delight
definitions.example: His shrewd little eyes twinkled roguishly.

definitions.definition: To bat, blink or wink the eyes
A shining with fast intermittent light.
A very short period, notionally the time it takes to blink the eyes.
definitions.example: The housework was done in a twinkling.
